<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel a migration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/migrations/{migration_id}/cancel"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to cancel a running migration in your Port organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details

      <ParamsItem

        param={{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"migration_id","description":"The identifier of the migration you want to cancel.<br/>","required":true}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><MimeTabs

          name={"reason"}
